storagePermissionNeeded: Storage permission is needed to download the photo to your device.
imageResultDialogErrorText: Your photo coins will only be spent after a successful transaction. Don't worry.
accountDeletionWarning: This operation cannot be undone. Can you confirm to delete your account?
authPolicyAgreement: By logging in you agree to {}
userDataNotFoundErrorText: Error happened during login. Please try again.
unsupportedFileTypeErrorText: Unsupported file types. Please pick another file.
errorVerifyDevice: Error occured when trying to verify your device. Try again later.
rejectedVerifyDevice: Your device cannot verified, please contact to support.

tooltips.colorizeImage:
Colorize Mode can colorize/recolor
black and white images to back real life.
tooltips.deblurImage:
Deblur Mode can restore
high-quality images from
low-quality images (e.g., downscaled,
noisy and compressed images).

continueDiscardDialog.title: Are you sure?
continueDiscardDialog.content: Unsaved photos will be destroyed. Are you sure you want to continue without saving?
